'''Radiant Spincrystal 131''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock a [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Descendants of Ahkantenal]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a chair on the left deck of Stage Tepetl in the [["Children of Echoes"]] Tribe.
